base_description: Rectangular, gray cabinet with drawers and doors.
part_description: Three drawers on top, three doors below, rectangular shape, evenly spaced.
internal_interaction_description: Drawers slide horizontally within the frame, supported by internal tracks. Doors are hinged on one side, allowing them to swing open and closed. Each drawer and door has a handle for easy operation.
external_interaction_description: Designed to store items, the cabinet interacts with users via handles for accessing contents. It can be placed against walls in kitchens or bathrooms, interacting with surrounding furniture and appliances.
